entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
